name: Chain Reaction (itch) (ChainGang)
description:
Join a game show unlike any other! Play as two contestants that are chained together. Work together to solve puzzles, maneuver dangerous obstacles, and battle for the high score. Just make sure that you don't break the chain!

Play with a friend with local co-op, or control both contestants in singleplayer. Face up to ten levels with hazardous environments. Playable with a keyboard and/or gamepad.

System Requirements OS:Windows 7 or above, macOS Sierra 10.12.6 or aboveProcessor AMD Ryzen 1300/Intel i3 or aboveGraphics:Nvidia GTX 750 or aboveDirectX:11Available space:
